patthana15.29:1.1: Arūpiṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naarūpī nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.29:2.1: Arūpiṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naarūpī naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.29:3.1: Rūpiṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā narūpī naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
